mapper.insert: insert into bs_user (id, mobile, username, password, enable_state, create_time, avatar) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enableState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update bs_user set mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enable_state = #{enableState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, mobile, username, password, enable_state, create_time, avatar from bs_user
